Roman',serif;font-size:38px;font-weight:100;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:150%;text-align:center;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;mso-line-height-alt:57px"><span class="tinyMce-placeholder" style="word-break: break-word;"> ALMOFADAS ! </span></h1></td></tr></tbody></table><table class="text_block block-2" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="10" cellspacing="0" role="presentation" style="mso-table-lspace:0;mso-table-rspace:0;word-break:break-word"><tbody><tr><td class="pad"><div style="font-family:sans-serif"><div class="" style="font-size:14px;font-family:Lato,Tahoma,Verdana,Segoe,sans-serif;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px;color:#000;line-height:1.2"><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">
Os essenciais para arrematar qualquer decoração, as almofadas nos remetem</p><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">sempre a momentos de descanso com pitadas de conforto</p></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table><div class="spacer_block block-3" style="height:1px;line-height:1px;font-size:1px"> </div><table class="image_block block-4" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" role="presentation" style="mso-table-lspace:0;mso-table-rspace:0">
<tbody><tr><td class="pad" style="width:100%"><div class="alignment" align="center" style="line-height:10px"><div style="max-width:527px"><img src="https://email-editor-production.s3.amazonaws.com/images/956298/almofadas%20fren.jpg" style="display:block;height:auto;border:0;width:100%" width="527" alt="" title="" height="auto"></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table><table class="text_block block-5" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="10" cellspacing="0" role="presentation" style="mso-table-lspace:0;mso-table-rspace:0;word-break:break-word"><tbody><tr><td class="pad"><div style="font-family:sans-serif"><div class="" style="font-size:14px;font-family:Lato,Tahoma,Verdana,Segoe,sans-serif;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px;color:#000;line-height:1.2"><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">COMO DEFINIR</p><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">1 - CORES</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">Comece pela definição das cores, se inspire em tons já existentes no ambiente,</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">
e adote-os como referência. Ex: detalhes de um quadro, tecidos, tapetes, enfeites.</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">Na dúvida, opte pelas cores neutras.</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">2 - TEXTURAS</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">Variedade de texturas trarão aconchego, veludos, camurças, linhos, bordados etc.</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">3 - PERSONALIDADE</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">Leve em conta seu gosto pessoal e se arrisque com uma única almofada com tom diferente dos outros,</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">normalmente uma almofada grande acomodada na parte de trás trará um toque de personalidade.</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">4 - SOBREPOSIÇÃO</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">Nos cantos ou na parte central do sofá utilize sobreposição de peças</p><p style="margin:0;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px">
com diferentes tamanhos, da maior para a menor, ótimo para trazer movimento.</p><p style="margin:0;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"><br><br></p><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p><p style="margin:0;font-size:14px;text-align:center;mso-line-height-alt:16.8px"> </p></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table><table class="image_block block-6" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" role="presentation" style="mso-table-lspace:0;mso-table-rspace:0"><tbody><tr><td class="pad" style="width:100%"><div class="alignment" align="center" style="line-height:10px"><div style="max-width:527px"><img src="https://email-editor-production.s3.amazonaws.com/images/956298/ECOM%20PLUS%20527%20X%20515%20PX%20%2823%29.jpg" style="display:block;height:auto;border:0;width:100%" width="527" alt="" title="" height="auto"></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table>

title: ALMOFADAS !! NOSSA INSPIRAÇÃO DE HOJE !
description: Essenciais para arrematar qualquer decoração, as almofadas nos remetem sempre a momentos de descanso com pitadas de conforto.
